timeline.bodyText: @timur-isangulov I see getDocumentJSON and getDocumentXML methods are using the same test id's in two different files, Any reason for not combining them together ?
timeline.author: Sanjeevani19

replies.bodyText: Not sure why there were a duplicates but I combined them. Thanks.
replies.author: timur-isangulov
